parameters.name: mms1_dis_disterr_brst
parameters.description: [List/Create only in CDAWeb] 1-sigma error: MMS1 FPI/DIS burst sky-map instrument distribution

parameters.name: mms1_dis_errorflags_brst
parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DIS vector of data-quality indicators at burst-start time

parameters.name: mms1_dis_compressionloss_brst
parameters.description: ---> MMS1 FPI/DIS compression lossless/lossy indicator at survey-start time

parameters.name: mms1_dis_steptable_parity_brst
parameters.description: ---> MMS1 FPI/DIS step table parity, this burst

parameters.name: mms1_dis_startdelphi_count_brst
parameters.description: ---> MMS1 FPI/DIS Del-Phi (obs spin-phase) count at burst-start time

parameters.name: mms1_dis_startdelphi_angle_brst
parameters.description: ---> MMS1 FPI/DIS Del-Phi (obs spin-phase) angle at burst-start time

parameters.name: mms1_dis_avgf1counts_brst
parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DIS burst average f1 count values

parameters.name: mms1_dis_steptimeoffsets_brst
parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DIS burst sky-map microsecond offsets from Epoch

parameters.name: mms1_dis_sector_despinp_brst
parameters.description: ---> MMS1 FPI/DIS sector de-Spin P value, this burst

parameters.name: mms1_dis_phi_brst
parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DIS burst sky-map instrument azimuthal angles

parameters.name: mms1_dis_energy_brst
parameters.description: MMS FPI/DIS burst sky-map parity 0/1 energies
